GameDBLocalizedString.Text:
Pobieranie materiału biologicznego w celu przeprowadzenia reakcji łańcuchowej polimerazy (PCR) w laboratorium. Test jest szybki, tani i dokładny. 

Wymagane pomieszczenie: Laboratorium hematologiczne 

Pobieranie: Pacjent musi być najpierw hospitalizowany. Test może być zlecony w każdym oddziale z wyjątkiem Izby Przyjęć. 

Wymagany sprzęt: Szkło laboratoryjne + Termocykler

Procedura chirurgiczna obejmująca pobranie wycinka tkanki (np. płuca, wątroby, jelita) do dalszej analizy. 

Wymagane pomieszczenie: Laboratorium histologiczne 

Pobieranie: Pacjent musi być najpierw hospitalizowany. Test może być zlecony w każdym oddziale z wyjątkiem Izby Przyjęć. 

Wymagany sprzęt: Szkło laboratoryjne + Analizator laboratoryjny + Mikroskop

Pobieranie krwi do badań serologicznych. 

Wymagane pomieszczenie: Laboratorium hematologiczne 

Pobieranie: Pacjent musi być najpierw hospitalizowany. Test może być zlecony w każdym oddziale z wyjątkiem Izby Przyjęć. 

Wymagany sprzęt: Szkło laboratoryjne + Analizator serologiczny

Pobranie próbki kału pacjenta do dalszych badań. 

Wymagane pomieszczenie: Laboratorium histologiczne 

Pobieranie: Pacjent musi być najpierw hospitalizowany na dowlonym oddziale. Test może być zlecony w przychodni Chorób Wewnętrznych. 

Wymagany sprzęt: Szkło laboratoryjne + Analizator kału

Sampling of mid-stream urine from a patient, or from a patient's catheter. 

Required room for testing: Histology Lab 

Sampling: Can be ordered in all departments at clinics or inpatients wards. 

Required equipment: Glassware + Lab analyzer

Microbial sampling is the collection of samples from the patient (e.g. body fluids, sputum, stool) for further analysis. 

Required room for testing: Microbiology Lab 

Sampling: Patient must be hospitalized at any department. Can be ordered at Neurology clinic. 

Required equipment: Glassware + Fume hood + Microbiolog. incubator + Microscope

The sampling of blood for a Complete Blood Count (CBC) test. 

Required room for testing: Hematology Lab 

Sampling: Patient must be hospitalized at any department. 

Required equipment: Glassware + Hematoanalyzer

The collection of a stool sample from the patient in order to quantify the amount of the elastase produced by the pancreas. It indicates the actual function of the pancreas. 

Required room for testing: Hematology Lab 

Sampling: Patient must be hospitalized at Emergency, General Surgery or the ICU. 

Required equipment: Glassware + RIA

Collecting various samples from the patient's body for cultivation in order to determine if fungal species are present or not. 

Required room for testing: Microbiology Lab 

Sampling: Can be ordered at the Emergency department or ICU 

Required equipment: Glassware + Fume hood + Microbiolog. incubator + Microscope

Sampling of peritoneal fluid with a large needle and syringe through the abdominal wall. 

Required room for testing: Histology Lab 

Sampling: Patient must be hospitalized at General Surgery or the ICU. 

Required equipment: Glassware + Medical centrifuge + Lab analyzer

Sampling of cerebrospinal fluid is performed by inserting a needle through the lower back into the spinal canal, draining a small amount of cerebrospinal fluid. 

Required room for testing: Histology Lab 

Sampling: Patient must be hospitalized at Internal Medicine, Neurology or the ICU. 

Required equipment: Glassware + Medical centrifuge + Lab analyzer

Enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay is a laboratory technique used to detect and quantify peptides, proteins, antibodies and hormones. 

Sampling: Patient must be hospitalized first. Can be ordered at any department except Emergency. 

Required equipment: Glassware + RIA

Reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction is a laboratory technique combining reverse transcription of RNA into DNA and amplification of specific DNA targets using PCR. 

Required room for testing: Hematology Lab 

Sampling: Patient must be hospitalized first. Can be ordered at any department except Emergency. 

Required equipment: Glassware + Thermal cycler
